page.title: 11Changing Village
page.content: many people in our survey said that they did not tink that the village has changed much. The biggest change is the post office being closed down. That was really the only shop around. The earest shops are in Redditch which is difficult to get to if you have not got a car. A few more houses have been built around the village. There are more younger people living there. One man said the younger generation never join in with the events that take place at the peace memorial Hall. Apart from these the village is still the same friendly place.
